text: <https://blogg.komplettbedrift.no/tag/skjerm>
<@U25PYL3Q8> do you have any ideas?

Hi everyone, is there any way to make drop-down with active records?
for ex: 1. created one custom object called chapter and contact object.
2. created association contact to chapter.
3. in contact object want to create field called primary chapter using drop-down field and in this field need to load associated chapters name.

it is possible or not.

Not that I can think of but could you use association labels instead?
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/create-and-use-association-labels>
And what page isn't showing up in here?
Are user defined and 1 the parameters tht are correct? Or the first one… that is going to be where the issue would be. How did you get those values?
To test the functionality I added entry ID and in last 1 is Definition ID.
I guess I am not sure from where I can get correct definition ID.
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/crm-associations-overview>
This is the document I am referring for the Definition ID. But there is no any ID for the events.
This is how the preview looks
Can you share a preview link? I can check it out in about 30 minutes
Custom objects will be defined in the schema when you created the object. It won't be in the Associations API list that you see there since you are associating to a non-standard object
If you hit this api endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas> then you should be able to search for your object ID and go from there.
(you'll need an API key or a private app to authenticate but can use postman to retrieve these properties.
That's how I would accomplish this. Thanks rem!
<@U25C65C3S> Thank you so much for your detailed answer. I really appreciate it. I will try it.
<@U25PYL3Q8> Thank you for your help. I really appreciate.

NOW, why that doesn’t work out of the box — i have no clue
Thanks! Yeah, my main issue is that the width adjuster isn't showing (image1) like it does in the example (image2).
